title: Frontend Developer Intern
description:
We are looking for a passionate Frontend Developer Intern to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will assist in developing and maintaining our web applications, working closely with senior developers and UX/UI designers.

You will gain hands-on experience with React.js, TypeScript, and modern front-end technologies while contributing to real projects that impact our users. This is a 3-month internship with the possibility of extension or conversion to a full-time role for exceptional performers.
eligibility:
3rd or 4th year Computer Science student with basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experience with React is a plus.

Requirements:
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Good communication abilities
- Ability to work in a team environment
- Portfolio of personal or academic projects (preferred)
applicationSteps:
Submit your CV, portfolio (if available), and a cover letter explaining why you're interested in this position.

Email your application to careers@example.com with the subject line 'Frontend Developer Intern Application'.

Shortlisted candidates will be invited for a technical interview and coding assessment.

title: Research Assistant
description:
Join our research team for a fascinating project on natural language processing and machine learning. This research opportunity is perfect for students interested in pursuing advanced studies in these fields.

You'll be working on cutting-edge research problems, implementing and testing novel algorithms, collecting and analyzing data, and potentially contributing to academic publications.

This is a paid research assistant position for 20 hours per week, with flexibility to accommodate your class schedule.
eligibility:
Graduate students with background in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, or related fields. Proficiency in Python and experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch required.

Requirements:
- Strong mathematical background
- Experience with implementing ML models
- Ability to read and understand research papers
- Good programming skills, particularly in Python
applicationSteps:
Email your CV, academic transcript, and a brief statement of research interests to research@example.com with the subject 'Research Assistant Application'.

Please include links to any previous research projects or implementations you've worked on.

Shortlisted candidates will be invited for an interview with the research team.

title: Business Development Associate
description:
A leading financial technology company is seeking a Business Development Associate to help expand their market presence. This is a full-time opportunity with great career growth potential.

In this role, you will identify and pursue business opportunities, develop relationships with potential clients, create compelling proposals, and work closely with the product team to ensure client needs are met.

The position offers competitive compensation, including base salary and performance bonuses, as well as opportunities for rapid advancement.
eligibility:
Recent graduates with a degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. Strong communication skills and interest in fintech required.

Requirements:
- Excellent verbal and written communication
- Analytical thinking and problem-solving skills
- Proficiency in MS Office suite
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Knowledge of financial services industry is a plus
applicationSteps:
Apply through our online portal with your CV and a cover letter. Shortlisted candidates will be invited for an interview.

Application link: https://example.com/careers/apply/bd-associate

The selection process includes an initial screening, a first-round interview, and a final interview with senior management.

title: Marketing Intern
description:
Join our marketing team and gain hands-on experience in digital marketing, content creation, and social media management for a fast-growing e-commerce platform.

You will assist with developing marketing campaigns, creating engaging content for social media platforms, analyzing marketing metrics, and supporting the team with various marketing initiatives.

This is a 4-month internship with a flexible schedule (15-20 hours per week) and includes a monthly stipend.
eligibility:
Marketing or Business students in their 3rd or 4th year. Knowledge of social media platforms and basic design tools preferred.

Requirements:
- Creative mindset and excellent writing skills
- Understanding of major social media platforms
- Basic knowledge of marketing principles
- Familiarity with design tools like Canva or Adobe Suite is a plus
- Strong organizational skills
applicationSteps:
Send your resume to careers@example.com with 'Marketing Internship Application' as the subject line.

Please include a brief cover letter and links to any portfolios or examples of your work if available.

Shortlisted candidates will be asked to complete a small marketing task as part of the selection process.

title: Mobile App Developer
description:
We are looking for a talented Mobile App Developer to join our product team. In this role, you will be responsible for building and maintaining high-quality mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms.

You'll work closely with our design and backend teams to implement new features, ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs, and optimize application performance.

This is a full-time position with competitive compensation, health benefits, and career growth opportunities.
eligibility:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field with at least 2 years of experience in mobile app development.

Requirements:
- Proficiency in React Native or Flutter
- Experience with native app development in Swift or Kotlin is a plus
- Knowledge of offline storage, threading, and performance optimization
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries
- Understanding of the entire mobile development life cycle
applicationSteps:
Submit your application through our careers portal: https://example.com/careers/mobile-dev

Please include your CV, links to your GitHub profile or portfolio, and a cover letter.

The selection process includes a technical assessment and multiple interview rounds.

title: Data Science Research Project
description:
Join an exciting research project focused on applying data science techniques to environmental monitoring and climate change prediction.

You will work with a multidisciplinary team to collect, clean, and analyze environmental data; develop statistical models and machine learning algorithms; and help create data visualizations for scientific publications.

This is a 6-month research position with the possibility of extension based on project funding and performance.
eligibility:
Graduate students in Data Science, Statistics, Environmental Science, or related fields.

Requirements:
- Strong background in statistics and machine learning
- Proficiency in Python, R, or similar data analysis tools
- Experience with data visualization libraries
- Knowledge of environmental science concepts is a plus
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
applicationSteps:
Email your CV, academic transcript, and a brief statement of interest to climate-research@example.edu

Subject line should be 'Data Science Research Application - [Your Name]'

Please include any relevant research experience or projects in your application.
